item.title: 中国顶尖企业将人工智能代理视为下一个战场
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）从香港为您报道中国最大的人工智能公司的当务之急。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov checks in from Hong Kong with a look at what’s top of mind for China’s biggest AI companies.】

item.title: 特朗普关于美国将获得 21 万亿美元投资的说法对吗？
item.description: 白宫列出了近 9.6 万亿美元的新投资承诺，少于特朗普吹嘘的数额。【原文：The White House lists nearly $9.6 trillion in new investment pledges, less than what’s boasted by Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普的牛肉价格战满足了美国永不满足的需求
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统正在开展一场降低牛肉价格的运动。但是，美国对蛋白质的强大需求使这一目标难以实现。【原文：President Donald Trump is on a campaign to bring down beef prices. But the nation’s powerful demand for protein is making that goal difficult.】

item.title: 贝莱德希望在新一轮交易热潮中将沙特投资翻番
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的目标是在未来几年内迅速扩大其在沙特阿拉伯和更广泛的中东地区的投资，因为该公司希望利用从基础设施到人工智能等领域的蓬勃发展。【原文：BlackRock Inc. aims to rapidly grow its investments in Saudi Arabia and the wider Middle East in the next few years as it looks to tap into a rush of activity in areas from infrastructure to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 诺和诺德称新一代糖尿病注射液使体重减轻 14.5%
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）称，在一项研究中，一种下一代糖尿病注射剂降低了患者的血糖，并帮助他们减轻了体重，这可能是这家陷入困境的制药商未来产品组合的一个积极信号。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S said a next-generation diabetes shot lowered patients’ blood sugar and helped them lose weight in a study that may be a positive sign for the embattled drugmaker’s future portfolio.】

item.title: 十年前的谷歌芯片挑战英伟达
item.description:
TPU可能是打破 Nvidia 在人工智能计算能力市场上的垄断地位的秘诀

item.title: 人工智能狂热的三年：ChatGPT 如何重整股市秩序
item.description: 三年前，OpenAI 发布了 ChatGPT，在华尔街掀起了一股人工智能狂潮。从那以后，股市就一蹶不振。【原文：Three years ago, OpenAI released ChatGPT, setting off a mania on Wall Street for all things artificial intelligence. And the stock market hasn’t been the same since.】

item.title: 美国数据将显示通胀回归的风险导致国债下滑
item.description: 美国数据预计将显示通胀压力反弹，这将削弱对美联储降息的猜测，在此之前，国债下滑。【原文：Treasuries slipped ahead of US data expected to show a rebound in inflation pressures, which would dent speculation over Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 乌克兰再次袭击俄罗斯黑海石油基础设施
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称其和平建议取得进展之际，乌克兰本月第三次袭击了俄罗斯在黑海的关键能源基础设施。【原文：Ukraine attacked key Russian key energy infrastructure on the Black Sea for a third time this month just as President Donald Trump cited progress on his peace proposal.】

item.title: 在人工智能和全球扩张之后，马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润增长 10
item.description: 中国数字支付巨头蚂蚁金服集团公司通过人工智能模型、仿人机器人和医疗保健增强了其人工智能能力，该公司的季度利润增长了 10%。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s quarterly profit grew 10% after the Chinese digital payments giant bolstered its artificial intelligence capacity via AI models, humanoid robots and health care.】

item.title: 巴西初级矿工联合起来推动关键矿产议程
item.description: 在巴西开发关键矿产项目的初级矿业公司正联合起来，为他们的共同利益而努力，因为巴西正努力成为战略资源争夺战的主要参与者。【原文：Junior mining companies developing critical minerals projects in Brazil are banding together to advocate for their shared interests as the country seeks to be a key participant in the race for the strategic resources.】

item.title: 智利质疑刺激养老基金回报的掉期交易
item.description: 智利的养老基金已经迷上了利率衍生品来增加收益，其名义头寸已经膨胀到 5000 多亿美元，比三年前增加了 100 倍。【原文：Chile’s pension funds have become hooked on interest-rate derivatives to juice returns, with their notional positions ballooning to more than $500 billion, a 100-fold increase from just three years ago.】

item.title: 受人工智能和云计算增长推动，阿里巴巴营收超预期
item.description: 乘着中国人工智能发展的东风，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）公布的季度收入增长好于预期。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue growth, riding China’s AI development boom.】

item.title: Alphabet 反弹威胁全球最有价值股票排名
item.description: 有迹象表明，这家搜索巨头正在努力与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Alphabet Inc. shares are poised to shake up the ranking of the world’s most valuable companies, amid signs the search giant is making headway in efforts to rival Nvidia Corp.’s bestselling AI accelerator.】

item.title: 美股 12 月强劲走势受到人工智能萎靡的考验
item.description: 几周前，在对人工智能相关股票的持续需求、稳健的盈利和季节性走强的历史背景下，美股年底反弹似乎已成定局。现在，华尔街却不那么确定了。【原文：A year-end rally in US stocks seemed like a lock a few weeks ago amid relentless demand for AI-linked shares, solid earnings and a history of seasonal strength. Now Wall Street isn’t so sure.】

item.title: 银行为 Cinven 持有的 UAX 股份准备超过 7 亿欧元的一揽子债务方案
item.description: 随着收购债务一揽子计划在新的一年到来之前不断增加，银行已准备好超过 7 亿欧元的杠杆贷款，以支持 Cinven 收购西班牙私立大学阿方索十世萨比欧大学（Universidad Alfonso X El Sabio）的多数股权。【原文：Banks have lined up a leveraged loan of more than €700 million to back Cinven’s majority stake in the Spanish private university Universidad Alfonso X El Sabio, as the pipeline of buyout debt packages builds ahead of the new year.】

item.title: Codelco 为 2026 年对华铜销售提供创纪录的溢价
item.description: 智利铜生产商科德尔科公司（Codelco）正在推动大幅提高向中国客户供应精炼金属的年度溢价，这凸显了人们对大量金属涌向美国可能很快会造成世界其他地区金属短缺的担忧。【原文：Chilean copper producer Codelco is pushing for a massive hike in annual premiums for refined metal supplies to its Chinese customers, highlighting concerns that a rush of metal to the US may soon create a shortage in the rest of the world.】

item.title: 巴里克将向马里支付 4.3 亿美元以解决金矿争端
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴里克矿业公司已同意与马里达成 2,440 亿非洲法郎（约合 4.3 亿美元）的和解协议，作为结束长达两年的纠纷的协议的一部分。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. has agreed to a 244 billion CFA francs ($430 million) settlement with Mali, as part of a deal to end a two-year dispute that shuttered one of the company’s most important gold operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台积电对英特尔前高管提起商业机密诉讼
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. says it filed a lawsuit against a former executive who joined Intel Corp.】

item.title: 周大福因黄金税改影响未达预期
item.description: 周大福珠宝集团有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.）报告称，在更广泛的经济逆风中，该公司的利润略低于预期，因为在中国取消长期存在的黄金退税后，该公司对长期前景的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd. reported slightly weaker-than-expected profits amid broader economic headwinds, as concerns grew about its longer-term outlook following China’s removal of a long-standing tax rebate on gold.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎母公司认为廉价技术将推动印度电动汽车销售
item.description: 塔塔汽车乘用车有限公司（Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd.）的一位高管表示，随着新企业的加入以及技术成本的下降使电池驱动汽车的价格更加合理，印度的电动汽车市场有望实现快速增长。【原文：India’s electric vehicle market is poised for rapid growth as new players enter and falling technology costs make battery-powered cars more affordable, said a top executive at Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd.】

item.title: 估值 40 亿美元后，Sword 首席执行官称 IPO 暂时 "无聊
item.description: Sword Health 公司 41 岁的创始人毫不讳言自己的雄心壮志—；或者说，他对走传统的上市之路并不感兴趣。【原文：Sword Health’s 41-year-old founder isn’t shy about his ambitions — or his lack of interest in taking the conventional path to the public markets.】

item.title: 丹麦房价飙升令央行警惕稳定性问题
item.description: 丹麦中央银行警告说，丹麦首都飙升的房价有可能蔓延到该国其他地区，威胁金融稳定。【原文：Soaring house prices in Denmark’s capital risk spilling over to the rest of the country and threatening financial stability, the nation’s central bank warned.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的公司将在 20 亿美元大宗交易中出售 Kioxia 股票
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的一家实体将在大宗交易中抛售 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 的股份，因为该公司自一年前首次公开募股以来股价一路飙升。【原文：A Bain Capital-backed entity will dump a stake in Kioxia Holdings Corp. in a block trade as the stock has surged since its initial public offering about a year ago.】

item.title: 部长称马来西亚陆军基金将削减在阿芬公司的股份至 9
item.description: 马来西亚国防部长穆罕默德-哈立德-诺丁（Mohamed Khaled Nordin）表示，马来西亚武装部队养老基金将把其在阿芬银行有限公司（Affin Bank Bhd）的持股比例降至 9%，因为该基金寻求减持战略资产，并将收益投资于固定收益。【原文：Malaysia’s Armed Forces Pension Fund will reduce its stake in Affin Bank Bhd. to 9% as it seeks to reduce holdings in strategic assets and invest the proceeds in fixed income, Defense Minister Mohamed Khaled Nordin said.】

item.title: 卡塔尔电信股票销售燃起股市复苏希望
item.description: 卡塔尔是中东地区股票销售最冷清的市场之一，该国的一次规模可观的后续股票发行激起了人们对多哈证券交易所活动回暖的一丝希望。【原文：A sizable follow-on equity offering in Qatar, one of the Middle East’s quietest markets for share sales, is stirring tentative hopes for a pickup in activity on Doha’s bourse.】

item.title: 印度银行考虑为不受制裁的俄罗斯石油贸易提供融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，如果俄罗斯石油的交易量来自非黑名单上的卖家，并且交易符合制裁规定，印度的银行现在愿意考虑为俄罗斯石油贸易提供融资。【原文：Banks in India are now willing to consider financing trade in Russian oil if volumes come from non-blacklisted sellers and transactions are sanctions-compliant, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员为英国预算动荡避险，英镑波动性飙升
item.description: 在周三的英国预算案公布之前，针对英镑波动的保护成本已飙升至七个月来的最高点。【原文：The cost of protection against swings in sterling has surged to a seven-month high before Wednesday’s UK budget.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行发现非洲和亚洲跨境交易流量激增
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）南非分部负责人表示，随着跨境交易流量的回升以及非洲大陆最大经济体出现复苏迹象，巴克莱银行在非洲的投资和私人银行业务的交易渠道十分畅通。【原文：Barclays Plc has a strong pipeline of deals across its investment and private-banking businesses in Africa as cross-border deal flow picks up and the continent’s largest economy shows signs of recovery, the head of its South African unit said.】

item.title: 剑桥大学考虑至少出售 10 亿美元与卫生部门相关的债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，JD.com 公司正寻求通过出售与股票挂钩的债券来筹集至少 10 亿美元的资金，这将是中国电子商务公司近期债务发行浪潮中的最新一笔。【原文：JD.com Inc. is looking to raise at least $1 billion through an equity-linked bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the latest in a wave of recent debt offerings by Chinese e-commerce companies.】
